All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
ApplicationController
The ApplicationController class handles the setup of the connection to the server.
BaseGameManager
Defines a general game manager for both client and server.
Card
Defines the concept of a card in Cat Lady.
CardDeserializer
 
CardMatrixPanel
The CardMatrixPanel class represents a panel in the GUI where a matrix of cards is displayed, along with buttons for interaction at the top and right sides.
CardNotFoundException
Model the exception related to a card that is not found.
CardType
Defines the possible card types
CatCard
Defines a card that models a cat card, either a normal card or a stray cat card.
CatColor
Defines the color that a cat card can have.
CatnipCard
Models a catnip card.
CatNotFedException
Model the exception related to a cat card that should be fed but it is not.
CatPower
Defines the powers of the cats that have one.
ChatEvent
 
ChatLog
 
ChatMessage
 
ChatMessageDeserializer
 
ChatMessageSerializer
 
ChatPanel
A panel containing the chat, the button to leave the lobby and, eventually, a GameStartPanel.
ClientGameManager
Models the game for a single player without information reserved to the server.
ClientGameManagerDeserializer
 
ClientHandler
Handle a specific client connected to the server.
ClientListener
Listen to the messages sent by a client.
ClientLobby
Lobby as seen by the client
ClientPrivateLobby
Models a private lobby with an access code.
ClientPublicLobby
Models a public lobby.
ClientStatus
A class that models the current status of client elements, including lobbies and game board.
ClientUpdater
Send messages to the client.
ConnectionManager
Handle the connection with the server.
CostumeCard
Models a costume card.
CreateLobbiesPanel
A panel used to create a lobby, it contains radio-buttons to set the lobby as public or private, text fields to set the lobby and player name and a button to confirm.
DeserializationUtils
 
FeedCatsPanel
The FeedCatsPanel class is designed to display a list of cat feeding elements, each consisting of an image and a set of buttons with icons.
FileUtils
 
FoodCard
Models a food card.
FoodReserve
Handle the food resources of the game and the players.
FoodReserveDeserializer
 
FoodType
Defines the types of food and their max amount at the start of the game.
GameAction
Defines the action of playing 2 copies of a LostCatCard
GameAlreadyStartedException
Model the exception related to an action to do before the game start requested during the game.
GameMatrix
A class that represents a 3x3 matrix of Card objects.
GameMatrixDeserializer
 
GameMatrixSerializer
 
GamePanel
The GamePanel class represents the main game panel in the user interface.
GameServer
The server, handling client connecting.
GameStartPanel
This panel contains the button that the creator can use to start the game.
GenericCard
A generic card that can be extended to add specific characteristic.
GhostTextField
Text field with a ghost hint to show if no other text is present
GsonUtils
 
GUI
main frame, changes its content according to the game phase.
IllegalNameFormatException
Model the exception called when the lobby or player are created with a name too short, too long or with illegal characters.
IllegalNumberOfPlayerInLobbyException
Model the exception called when the number of player in a lobby is not between 2 and 4 when the game is started.
IllegalPlayException
Model the exception related to an illegal play during the game, like playing wrong cards or using food resources not owned.
InputChangeListener
 
InteractionController
Management of GUI-produced messages, which are put in the queue, also used to retrieve additional information for GUI related purposes.
JoinLobbiesPanel
A panel used to join an existing lobby, public or private.
Leaderboard
Calculate the detailed score for each card category that produces a score.
LeaderboardPanel
Panel containing a leaderboard and a label with the winning player name
ListUtils
 
Lobby
 
LobbyAdapter
Converts a lobby to its data transfer object or extended data transfer object.
LobbyDTO
 
LobbyDTODeserializer
 
LobbyEDTODeserializer
 
LobbyEDTOSerializer
 
LobbyExtendedDTO
 
LobbyManager
 
LobbyNameAlreadyExistsException
Model the exception called when it is created a lobby with a name already in use.
LobbyNotExistsException
Model the exception called when a requested lobby is not found.
LostCatCard
Model a list cat card.
Message
A message that can be sent.
NoCodeForPrivateLobbyException
Model the exception called when a player tries to access a private lobby without a code.
NotEndGameException
Model the exception related to an action to do during end game that is requested before the end game.
NotificationMessage<T>
A type of message used to notify the clients not in response of a request.
NotificationMessageDeserializer<T>
 
NotificationType
the possible types of notification that can be sent with the type of the content.
NotPlayerTurnException
Model the exception related to a player performing an action when it is not its turn.
OptionalDeserializer<T>
 
OptionalSerializer<T>
 
Pair<X,Y>
 
PairDeserializer<X,Y>
 
PairSerializer<X,Y>
 
PlayerAlreadyInLobbyException
Model the exception called when a player tries to enter a lobby when it is in another lobby.
PlayerBoard
Defines the board of a player in a game.
PlayerBoardDeserializer
 
PlayerBoardSerializer
 
PlayerCardsPanel
PlayerCardsPanel is a custom JPanel that displays a player's cards horizontally with a scrollable view.
PlayerCatsPanel
PlayerCatsPanel is a custom JPanel that displays a player's cat cards in a grid layout.
PlayerIsNotLobbyCreatorException
Model the exception called when the player tries to start the game when it is not the lobby creator.
PlayerNameAlreadyTakenException
Model the exception called when the name selected by a player is already in use in the lobby it is entering.
PlayerNotInLobbyException
Model the exception called when the player tries to make an action in a lobby where it is not part of.
PointCategory
Models the score for each category for a player.
PointCategoryDeserializer
 
PointCategorySerializer
 
RegexDocumentFilter
Regex and length filter for text fields
RequestHandler
handle the messages sent from the client and produce response and notifications
RequestMessage<T>
A type of message sent by the client to request something from the server.
RequestMessageDeserializer<T>
 
RequestType
The types of request that can be sent with the type of the argument associated.
ResourcesPanel
A JPanel that displays resource information in a grid layout.
ResponseMessage<T>
A type of message sent by the server in response of a request from the client.
ResponseMessageDeserializer<T>
 
ResponseStatus
The possible statuses of a response message.
ResponseType
the types of response that can be sent.
RoundBorder
Round border for a component
RowColumnIdentifier
Defines all the rows and columns of the GameMatrix.
SelectedCardPanel
SelectedCardPanel is a JPanel that displays a selected card image and associated action buttons.
ServerGameManager
Handle the state of the game for the players in a Lobby.
ServerHandler
The Client class establishes a connection to the server, creates the GUI, and manages the message sending and receiving functionalities using executor services.
ServerListener
Listen for messages form the server.
ServerMessage
A category of messages sent by the server to the clients.
ServerMessageDeserializer
 
ServerMessageHandler
Use the messages received to update the client model state and the GUI.
ServerUpdater
A class that handles sending messages from a message queue to a socket.
SpecialFoodRequest
Defines special ways in which a cat can be fed.
SprayBottleCard
models a spray bottle card.
StartClient
Client starting point
StartServer
Server starting point.
StrayCatsPanel
The StrayCatsPanel class represents a panel that displays a row of buttons, each representing a stray cat.
ToyCard
Models a toy card.
ToyType
defines all types for ToyCard
TypeTokenProvider
 
UnknownCardException
Model the exception called when a card is not recognized by the game.
UpdateButtonState
 
UpdateController
Methods to perform actions on the GUI.
WrongAccessCodeException
Model the exception called when a player tries to access a private lobby with a wrong code.
